FontTable Property

CDXML Name:fonttable
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_FontTable
CDX Constant Value:0x0100
Data Size:CDXFontTable
Property of objects:kCDXObj_Document
First written/read in:ChemDraw 4.0
Required?Required if fonts are used

Description:

A list of fonts used in the document.

This property is used only in CDX files. In CDXML files, a Font Table object is saved instead.

 

CDX Documentation index
